title: Serve Robotics has deployed 2,000+ delivery robots across the U.S.
description:
Since the start of the year, Serve Robotics has expanded its fleet of sidewalk delivery robots twentyfold.

The post Serve Robotics has deployed 2,000+ delivery robots across the U.S. appeared first on The Robot Report.
